item.title: 5 Essential Tips on Why and How to Invest in Digital Marketing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Want to Know More on How to Invest in Digital Marketing? Here are Some Great Tips.

Digital marketing is becoming one of the most important activities for any company. Weather you are a small business owner working with plumbing or large scale logistics company, you need to invest in digital marketing. Some people think in a way, ok I will make myself a website, nothing fancy, just to have one and that is digital marketing. Well, they are wrong. There is much more to digital marketing that just web presence. But how to decide which form of digital marketing is for you? Many people doesn't understand digital marketing in depth so they pay for ads on some sites, Google Ads and when it doesn't result with results they hoped, they give up. So how to approach to solution of this problem? First of all you need to define who are your key customers. What are your customers problems and what can you do to fix them? You found answer to this question? Great! Now you can start thinking on digital marketing. The most effective way is content marketing. Write valuable content, content that will reach your target customer and show them how you can solve their problems. Content marketing takes time, a lot of time, but is in the end one of the most effective ways of digital marketing.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Creating Incident Recovery Plan for Enescent Global
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397296769{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="2532"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397327069{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights
" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EEnescent%20Global%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMedia8%20%26%20Co%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESecurity%20Incident%20Management%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Dealing with IT Security incidents can be difficult, time and money consuming process. ConsultingPress helps companies in providing detailed procedures for dealing with and mitigating security incidents. We provided detailed procedures for security incident management to our clients, Supralo Ltd., which resulted in faster reaction to IT Security incidents and it's proper management.
When creating any level of IT Security you need to look at your company as a whole, decide which assets are of critical, vital importance for your company, and here we mean on all assets, including people. You need to have detailed plan and procedures on what needs to be done if some sort of security incident happens.
ConsultingPress provided complete service of Security Incident Program creation for Enescent Global, company from New York USA.
ConsultingPress helped to assure IT Security in Enescent Global is on highest level and educate employees and business partners of value and importance of IT Security.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Vulnerabilities%20and%20Threats%20Detection%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Analysis%20of%20Business%20Relationships%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20analysis%20of%20Enescent%20Global%20vendors%2C%20it's%20rights%20to%20IT%20assets%20of%20the%20company%2C%20ways%20of%20communication%20and%20information%20transfers.%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22IT%20Security%20Architecture%20%26%20Implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increased%20level%20of%20IT%20Security%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20vendor%20risk%20management%20plan%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Documented%20best%20practices%20and%20procedures%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Higher%20level%20IT%20Security%20awareness%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
